title: PDQ® Integrative Therapies Summaries
description: Information about complementary and alternative forms of medicine, or CAM, for cancer patients.
cleaned_text: Alternative, and Complementary Therapies This page lists cancer information summaries maintained by the PDQ Integrative, Alternative, and Complementary Therapies Editorial Board. Summaries Being Regularly Updated These summaries are reviewed and updated to reflect findings from recent research. The PDQ Integrative, Alternative, and Complementary Therapies summaries are carefully developed, thorough reviews on controversial topics which often are not addressed in medical education but are of particular interest to, and often used by, many patients. Acupuncture (PDQ®) [patient](/about-cancer/treatment/cam/patient/acupuncture-pdq) | [health professional](/about-cancer/treatment/cam/hp/acupuncture-pdq) Aromatherapy Dietary Supplements (PDQ®) [patient](/about-cancer/treatment/cam/patient/prostate-supplements-pdq) | [health professional](/about-cancer/treatment/cam/hp/prostate-supplements-pdq) Summaries No Longer Being Updated These summaries are no longer being updated. No ongoing studies are being conducted for these topics. The summaries are provided for reference purposes only. 714-X
